scripts.unix-package: ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rm -r dist && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json && cp -R projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/src/assets dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/assets
scripts.win-package: ng b ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && rmdir dist /S && ng-packagr -p projects/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer/ng-package.json && xcopy /S/E/-Y projects\ngx-extended-pdf-viewer\src\assets dist\ngx-extended-pdf-viewer\assets\
scripts.release: npm run unix-package && cd dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer && npm publish
scripts.updatedemo: npm run package | rm -r ../ExploringAngular/embedding-pdf/node_modules/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer | cp -r dist/ngx-extended-pdf-viewer  ../ExploringAngular/embedding-pdf/node_modules
